note:
English.
Bisexual old man who sometimes wears a sarong or skirt.
I shouldnt with my legs, but I am too old to care.
Always envied the clothes that girls wear. Not trans, Perhaps I was a girl in a previous life,
There must be an explanation for the way I feel.
I love soft colourful fabrics.
Happy in a dress or a skirt.
Like to swim naked especially with friends.

I Follow interesting people.
Happy to talk to anyone. x
